name: VASA
description: Voxel-based Architectural Space Analysis (VASA): Voxelization and analysis of 3D buildings and urban environments. Features include conversion of Dynamo geometry or triangle data into voxel models, 3D pathfinding, voxel-based daylight and visibility analysis, and sample point generation. VASA also provides solid, surface modification, fill, proximity, and density mapping operations for voxel models, and supports the importing and exporting of triangle data in STL format. Developed by Autodesk Research.
